qas.question: What percentage of Plymouth residents were suffering from poverty and deprivation in 2014?
As of 2014, what was the life expectancy of male Plymouth residents?
As of 2014, what was the life expectancy of female Plymouth residents?
Where did Plymouth's life expectancy rank out of the regions of South West England?

context: A 2014 profile by the National Health Service showed Plymouth had higher than average levels of poverty and deprivation (<a0_0>26.2%<a0_0/> of population among the poorest 20.4% nationally). Life expectancy, at <a1_0>78.3 years<a1_0/> for men and <a2_0>82.1<a2_0/> for women, was the <a3_0>lowest<a3_0/> of any region in the South West of England.
